scene_description_enriched: The scene depicts a group of men, some kneeling with hands clasped in prayer, and others standing behind them, looking towards a central figure identified as Christ. Christ, with a halo, stands facing the group, gesturing with his right hand. The background suggests an architectural setting with decorative elements resembling arches and windows with diamond-shaped panes. The overall impression is one of a religious discourse or teaching, with Christ addressing his followers.
